text: Very very good shawarma.....I was impressed both with the product AND the enthusiasm behind the counter!  I will return!
Great wrap. Chicken shwarma wrap was one of the best I've had. The salad didn't appeal to me but I only got it because I got a combo and I opted for a healthy side. Really good. I recommend it.

Our family really enjoys their food and we'd probably tried the entire menu by now. Even the kids 3 and 6 enjoy the food. The service is excellent, friendly and helpful. I highly recommend this place as a mid  week treat.
